sentences.sentence: "To the czars I say, Nyet," Rep. Harold Rogers (R-Ky.) said in support of the amendment.
sentences.translation: “我对垄断者说不”代表人哈罗德·罗杰斯在支持修正案时说。

sentences.sentence: Stand at the western tip of Vasilievsky Island. To the right is the elegant Winter Palace former home of the czars.
sentences.translation: 站在维丝利瓦斯基岛的西端，右边是优雅的冬宫，是沙皇从前的住处。

sentences.sentence: Stand at the western tip of Vasilievsky Island. To the right is the elegant Winter Palace, former home of the czars.
